entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #60633
  • HttpConnectionContext.TickHeartbeat() in SignalR ticks after the context is disposed, causing runtime errors when accessing context from heartbeat handlers #60631
  • MapOpenApi writes invalid json if example contains OpenApiDouble and CurrentCulture formats doubles with comma #60628
  • Router rerender view when navigating to same page if using Navigating #60626
  • Perf regression: json #60625

Closed

  • Perf improvement: single_query #60582
  • Perf improvement: updates #60624
  • HasAllowAnonymous() could be called earlier? Possible (small) improvement? #60611
  • OpenAPI example rendered incorrectly for strings that happen to be DateTime(Offset) strings #60630
  • Microsoft Identity is not blocking users not yet confirmed #60586
  • Blazor .NET 8 Automatic Logout on Plesk Hosting #60533
  • Issues with Blazor wwwroot folder moved to a subfolder #60627
  • Perf regression: updates #60615
  • Especialista Cibernético Hackear Celular Android ou Iphone #60621
  • NativeAOT: No coercion operator is defined between types 'Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringValues' and 'System.String' #60609

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Fix MD linting in area-owners.md #60632
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix incorrect path to included script file in Blazor project template #60607
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview3
  • Update branding to servicing #60620
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade Facebook Graph API version to v22.0 #59387
    area-auth, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • view-data-* attribute for partial tag helper #60459
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Clarify DefaultPolicy and FallbackPolicy Behavior in XML Docs #60619
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add support for ServerSentEventsResult and extension methods #60616
    area-minimal
  • Support resolving OpenAPI server URLs from HttpRequest #60617
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Abstract away the TestServer dependency from WebApplicationBuilder #60247
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: `left join` and `right join` query expression clauses #8947
  • [Proposal]: User defined compound assignment operators #9101

PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: update proposal based on latest decision #9182
  • Update based on LDM meeting #9180

Merged

  • Queue extensions topic for next week #9181
  • Expand first-class span proposal with a simple example #9176
  • Extensions: prepare notes for LDM #9179

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: include collection arguments #9162
  • [Proposal] Readonly setter calls on non-variables #9175

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: Use ExecutionStrategy for query execution #35692
    10.0.0
  • Some StartsWith scenarios are non-SARGable when they perhaps could be? Was it considered before? #35691

Closed

  • Update on a single record caused cascade update on entire table, setting all foreign key fields to NULL when upgrading from 3.0 to 7.0 #35595
  • Update of FK with Include of Reference will be ignored #35684
  • Scaffold uses system's comma separator for HasDefaultValue #35654
    10.0.0
  • First migrations log error that is a false positive #35690
  • Clarification on error with `Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design` #35685

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Set the environment when executing Scaffold-DBContext #35693

Merged

  • Use InvariantCulture for ChangeType() and decimal.TryParse() #35675
    community-contribution
  • Revert "[release/2.3] Use latest available Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderFactory.Sources" #35688

Updated

  • Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35617
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [ARM64] With NET7 RC1 installed, some files in the .exe installer and the .zip package are not identical #14279

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APK cannot install on Android 13 #28067
  • ScrollView TapGestureRecognizer - taping background doesn't fire Tapped event #28064
  • Allow use of new WebView2CompositionControl for WPF BlazorWebView #28063
    Backlog
  • Not showing ,net maui templates #28057
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid App Stuck on White Screen with WebKit Networking Errors on iOS #28052
  • ViewExtensions.OnUnloaded causes app crash if the view is already disposed, this happens for web view in Blazor Hybrid apps #28051
  • .NET MAUI Multi-Project App's WinUI project has incorrect runtime identifiers #28047
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Flyout text dissappears after locking the screen #23214
    Backlog
  • Changing FlyoutItem Title causes Title to disappear #15827
    Backlog
  • Built in MVU architecture support #28062
  • [Android] Animation lag when we use framework TranslateTo() method. #10789
  • [Windows] Flyout Shell Content title is not broken over multiple lines. #15017
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object: Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.NavigationRenderer.SetStatusBarStyle() at Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.NavigationRenderer.ViewWillAppear(Boolean animated) #27069
  • Issue on Windows - Exception thrown: 'System.NullReferenceException' in Microsoft.Maui.Controls.dll #26498
    Backlog
  • Make `ShadowTypeConverter` public and enabled nullable references `﻿#nullable enable` #27737
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Compiled code binding isn't intercepted #26616
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the performance of provisioning and running of device tests #28065
  • Fix bug in sample data template TextValidationBehavior flag #28061
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Make more internal methods public #28059
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling UITest Stepper actions for Maccatalyst #28055
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Make DisplayAlert & DisplayActionSheet more consistent by adding Async #28053
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-dialogalert, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] TabbedPage.AutoResizeIconsProperty #28046
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix for issues caused by setting Shell.FlyoutWidth on WinUI when binding context values are changed #27151
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed NRE when clearing ListView after navigating back #27274
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • add DebuggerTypeProxy for Shell #27989
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Run provisionator devdiv #28056
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28045
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public & nullable for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [BindingSG] Added Binding.Create support for xaml generated sources #27610
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml, delighter-sc
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Parameter hint truncated at call site #77355
  • Need to add new XML documentation tag to support C# primary constructors #77351
  • Partial default interface members are not virtual #77346
  • EnC: partial events and constructors #77345
  • IDE0200: "Lambda expression can be removed" suggests removing `ConfigureAwait(false)`. #77341
  • [EnC] Deleting partial definition that doesn't have an implementation fails assertion #77340

Closed

  • When source files generated by ISourceGenerator and IIncrementalGenerator are removed "Inheritance margin" and "CodeLens references" features crash #77357
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35825.276 #77348
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35825.320 #77347
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10325.04 #77339

PullRequests

Created

  • Flesh out metadata emit and validation around extension marker method #77358
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Preserve encoding during DocumentState updates #77354
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expression arguments: evaluate arguments before elements when calling `[CollectionBuilder]` factory method #77344
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Extensions: Resolve classic and new extension methods together #77343
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Generate-Documentation Check if file is excluded #77353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where we were crashing trying to get inheritance margin information for SG docs #77356
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add resource to automate github action merge PRs #77352
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [release/dev17.13] Fix issue parsing for-statement initializer chain with commas and no initializers #77350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose some functionality from SourceGeneratedDocumentUri to Razor #77342
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Explictly jump off the main thread before serializing data to call Razor #77321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement metadata signature conflict check for extension implementation methods #77338
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Adds lightbulb option to offer implementing `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: IDE #77337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expressions: add `params` cases to tests for invalid builder methods #77171
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Task.Delay(1000, stoppingToken)` does not throw a `TaskCanceledException` from a the `ExecuteAsync` method of a `BackgroundService` #112971
  • [API Proposal]: extend 'Attribute' model for feature APIs for custom feature switches #112969
  • System.Text.Json causes duplicate fields for overridden members #112967
  • [browser] failing blittable tests - src\tests\Interop\Interop.csproj #112963
    Future
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #112962
  • Improve allocateRegisters() and allocateRegistersMinimal() by representing and accessing local register sets in a more efficient manner #112961
  • Improve LSRA to handle more than 64 registers for x64 #112959
    10.0.0
  • Static cctor won't be called before executing DllImport in AOT-compiled code (Mono) #112958
  • [Performance improvement] Minimize number of properties placed in the runtimeconfig.json file #112956
  • JIT can't elide span.Slice range checks after a manual check #112953
    Future
  • [Android] System.Collections.Immutable tests timeout on android-arm and android-x86 #112948
  • [Android] System.Tests.RandomTests.Next_IntInt_Next_IntInt_AllValuesAreWithinRange failing on android-arm #112946
  • Consider adding `IBufferWriter<byte>` overloads to `JsonSerializer` #112943
    10.0.0

Closed

  • InterpreterFrame.SaveTraceToException publishes a private type #39433
  • [API Proposal]: More `MemoryExtension` methods accepting `SearchValues<T>` #109859
    Future
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.ConvertTests.ConvertChecked test failure #112755
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 1/18/2024 8:54:27 PM #97404
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler - expose buffer and reset #110505
    10.0.0
  • [Question] JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester fail with DOTNET_TieredCompilation=0 on Linux #104451
    10.0.0
  • Improve `allocateRegisters()` and `allocateRegistersMinimal()` by representing and accessing local register sets in a more efficient manner #112960
  • .NET TP Worker: segfault on Linux #112910
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.1.25103.13] Some apps retarget failed with CS0121 and CS0428 System.Linq errors #112462
    10.0.0
  • gcstress failures on arm64 #111192
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Codegen should unset register assignments after defining nodes that will be used from spill temps #105837
    10.0.0
  • JIT: More elaborate store forwarding patterns with physical promotion #86665
    10.0.0
  • System.Tests.GCTests.GetGCMemoryInfo test failed in CI #29434
  • NumberDecimalSeparator and possibly other IFormatProvider options aren't working on WinUI #31197
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Resources.Extensions.Tests.PreserializedResourceWriterTests #34495
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #34753
  • Expose DATAS mode in GCSettings #111774
  • ### **Title:** Missing `KeySize` Reading Access in `RSACertificateExtensions.GetRSAPrivateKey` on Linux (.NET 9) #112622
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update GC bridge debugging code #112970
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: give inlinees their own EH table #112968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area owners for hosting #112966
    area-Meta
  • Test - Please ignore #112965
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label
  • Add trim to FileInfo (issue #70524) #112964
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix exception propagation from managed to native on Unix #112957
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • using major version in tfm #112955
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid unnecessary write backs during physical promotion #112949
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Generate boot config as javascript module #112947
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • arm64: Add return cases into optimise bools #112945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Combine cast => negate => compare on ARM64 #112944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Enable Android CoreCLR and device startup testing #112939
    area-Infrastructure
  • [android] Make Android app on coreclr use host-runtime contract and provide external assembly probe #112938
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow R2R for images provided via external_assembly_probe #112934
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add approved TensorPrimitives surface area #112933
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Add MemoryExtensions.CountAny/ReplaceAny #112951
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Move local thread pool work items to global by default when blocking on a task #112796
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Make counting of IO completion work items more precise on Windows #112793
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Add DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler.Text/Clear #112171
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reapply "Use rangecheck in assertprop (#112766)" (#112872) #112907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip validation of debug info mappings in optimized codegen #112942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Add support for LDAPTLS_CACERTDIR \ TrustedCertificateDirectory #112531
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.4
  • [Android] Use lowered runtime flavor in Android sample app MakeFile #112940
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • add follow-up assert during unwinding #112817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump net10 downlevel versions to n-1 #112805
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix Contains for Distinct/Union with custom comparer #112815
    area-System.Linq
  • Only count DwarfDump errors produced by managed code #112813
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete old parameter ABI classification #112884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable GC stress tests for the interpreter test #112906
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Pass SourceBuiltPdbArtifactsDir parameteres to runtime build #112788
    needs-area-label
  • Temporary hotfix for interpreter crash #112920
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Differences between global tools invocations via generated apphost or dotnet CLI #47145
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 10 preview 2 SDK installed, Some files are not identical in .exe installer and in .zip package. #47129
  • GenAPI: Does not preserve `allows ref struct` "unconstraint" #47113
  • dotnet solution remove - smart project detection #47111

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]VS version on NET 10.0 preview 1 installation wizard should be displayed as 17.13. #46617
  • [NETE2ESDK] SDK installer with the suffix cm.2-aarch64.rpm is missing in .NET 10 Preview1 #46618
  • dotnet watch opens new browser tab on restart instead of reloading the existing tab #46175

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove underscore from `_UseManagedNtlm` #47141
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Regex pattern in test for dotnet test #47132
    Area-dotnet test
  • `dotnet sln remove` smart project matching #47112
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Avoid hardcoded path to VMR orchestrator package layout #47140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dotnet-new3 #47114
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.3xx] Add --configfile option to dotnet nuget push command #47143
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport to 9.0.1xx] Workflows: Don't allow merge if pr in lockdown (#46663) #47142
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add --configfile option to dotnet nuget push command #47126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet-watch: Fix race condition in tests #47117
    untriaged
  • Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts and enable caching #46796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't run the VMR Final Join in public rolling/scheduled builds #47139
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update MTP name in config file for dotnet test #47133
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add latest build table to VMR README #47136
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify redist-installer and build installers in the VMR #47104
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Delete workload-related things if the rest of the operation was unsuccessful #47110
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2651450 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change property used for after-publish target #47068
    untriaged
  • Create trust boundary doc Fixes #45340 #45666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Build tests on Linux and Windows #47106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47064
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Change MSTest Runner to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #47091
    Area-Common templates
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
